protein.specific_function: Plays a role in modulating the ganglioside content of the lipid bilayer at the level of membrane-bound sialyl glycoconjugates

reference.reference_text: Wada T, Yoshikawa Y, Tokuyama S, Kuwabara M, Akita H, Miyagi T: Cloning, expression, and chromosomal mapping of a human ganglioside sialidase. Biochem Biophys Res Commun. 1999 Jul 22;261(1):21-7.
